product_name: Baffin Belize Water Shoes - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Built for hikes that take you through streams and puddles, the Baffin Belize water shoes easily handle tough terrain and are built to actively drain water from the shoes to speed dry time. Nylon mesh uppers promote breathability; single-pull lacing system tightens easily for a snug, secure fit. Removable Water Channeling System helps drain water and dry quickly; ultra lightweight midsoles provide cushioning and absorb shock. Rugged rubber outsoles on the Baffin Belize water shoes supply great traction on both wet and dry surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Built for hikes that take you through streams and puddles, the Baffin Belize water shoes easily handle tough terrain and are built to actively drain water from the shoes to speed dry time.
